Types
msg_param

Holds a key-value-pair to pass parameters and their values.  Overloaded constructor for several parameter value types.

Properties
p_param

Name of the parameter

p_value

Value of the parameter

Functions
msg_param
constructor function msg_param(
self in out nocopy msg_param,
p_param in varchar2,
p_value in varchar2
)
return self

return self
